DOC.brief_summary: Web- internet-based program potential induce , possibly , help sustain , significant lifestyle modification . This study evaluate effect unique interactive web-based behaviour change program weight loss cardiovascular risk factor people overweight obese high risk cardiovascular disease .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Unique Web-based Behaviour Change Program Weight Loss Cardiovascular Risk Factors
DOC.criteria: Over 18 year old Have regular access internet , telephone email address . Body mass index ( BMI ) great 27 less 40 Sedentary Have one follow risk factor associate cardiovascular disease : Elevated blood pressure ≥ 140 mm Hg systolic ≥ 90 mm Hg diastolic ; Elevated total cholesterol ≥ 5.0 ; Type 2 diabetes Be willing refrain participate another behaviour change program duration study Major health problem include Type 1 diabetes , establish CVD , renal hepatic disease Psychiatric problem Pregnancy Excessive alcohol consumption
